description:
Trial can be difficult and extremely stressful when you're fighting for something important to you. It's imperative that you work with someone professional, successful and strong, but also compassionate; someone who understands the importance of family.

The Women's Legal Group at Tucker Griffin Barnes is comprised of female attorneys who handle all types of legal concerns. We dedicate ourselves to recognizing the unique needs of each of our clients, and tailor our representation to the best of our ability to ensure our clients' needs and goals are achieved. If you've been looking for a different legal experience, we're it -- We practice law from a woman's point of view.

(Please note: Several of our attorneys have male assistants.)

Please contact us today - It's the first step to putting your life back together.
